uge (most Monotheistic religions).

ectors.=C2=A0 It is important to note that Worldly Protectors are earth god=

=C2=A0Amida, better known as Amitabha or Amitayus (Infinite Light) (Infinit=

which, in all seriousness, is like a world that was purified due to Amitabh=
a's enligthenment.=C2=A0 
> =C2=A0 How did this happen ?
> =C2=A0=C2=A0 Bec=
ause of Interdependent Origination.
> =C2=A0
> =C2=A0Amitabha made a series=
 of vows and those vows were interdependent with his awakening. As he awoke=
, these vows ripened.=C2=A0 Most Buddhas have some kind of "related power".=
. that upon awakening, their vow ripens into that power ...so to speak.=C2=

cation of the world he was practicing on, and that once he attained enlight=
enment, his radiance would produce this pure field.

 vow that was ripened was that if you focus on Amitabha PROPERLY, you can c=
onnect with his radiance from your concentration meeting with his ripened v=
ow.

=A0 god-worshiping and "save me Oh Amida!" kinda of methodology.

>=

 His vows..etc.etc.. AS YOUR OBJECT OF CONCENTRATION... and through the pro=
cess of meditating and concentrating on these, you will create the connecti=
on with it.

> =C2=A0 It is actually suppose to be a form of medit=
ation... not salvation worship.=C2=A0 However, as most of the common folk, =
